casebody.data:
Richmond

Citizens Mutual Building Association, Incorporated v. George L. Bohannon. January 14, 1937.

Present, All the Justices.

Mann <& Tyler, for the plaintiff in error. M. T. Bohannon and /. Hume Taylor, for the defendant in error. Eggleston, J.,

delivered the opinion of the court.

The decision of this case is controlled by what we said in Citizens Mutual Building Association Inc. v. Mrs. Karl C. Edwards, decided at this term, ante, page 399, 189 S. E. 453. Tor the reasons there stated this judgment is likewise

Affirmed.
